channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IL
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for IL

item.title: Report X-2024071396
item.description:
Report X-2024071396

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-29T09:15:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-27
  • City: MATTESON
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: Wisconsin Central Railroad Ltd.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 767744
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: X-2024071396-On June 27, 2024, at 1050 hrs., train X39691-26 was northbound on the Matteson subdivision near milepost 21.7 and derailed 25 railcars, Line 33-57. Line 51 / CGTX 64557 / Residue / Liquified Petroleum Gas / UN 1075. Class 2.1 was discovered with a side wall puncture resulting in the release of vapors. X-2024071397 On June 27, 2024, at 1050 hrs., X39691-26 was northbound on the Matteson subdivision near milepost 21.7 and derailed 25 railcars, Line 33-57. Line 50 PROX 35841 / Residue / Liquified Petroleum Gas / UN 1075. Class 2.1 sustained severe damage from an impact to the pressure housing. A leak was discovered from the pressure plate flange, five pressure plate stud bolts were tightened which secured the leak.
